column5:
Same. I'm 31 - had 4 serious relationships in my 20s... 

In one right now for 5 months, and the bpd is SLAPPING.

I don't want to continue the cycle. I just want it to last. She's the sweetest, most understanding woman I've ever dated, so naturally the self sabotage has really started to spice things up ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¼ ğŸ™ƒ

I'm 31, trans guy - I am just being introduced to DBT through my therapist. I've only had 4 sessions with them so far, but it's been incredibly eye opening. 

Mental health/therapy is entirely new to me, so it's pretty shocking to read strangers describe my most secret thoughts and feelings. Grateful for the internet/all of you for contributing and helping all of us feel less alone.
Literally alladat... Master quickly, get over zealous, then bored/don't want to finish projects bc I'm slumpy again. ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ Iz hard!
I do this, but with various forms of art... Embroidery, woodworking, wood burning, metal earth builds, tattooing, ink drawing, baking, linocut etc.
This is why I have no friends. I can't keep up with them. I just slowly disappear/fade away. I only have 2 friends I can stand to be around/make an effort for. ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ It is what it is.
